name: Space Turtle's Laundry Day
description:
Space Turtle's spherical sock drawer has 2 kinds of sock that need to be sorted. Unfortunately since he's in a turbulent region of space, gravity keeps reversing and the pile keeps getting jumbled up. Can you help him to tidy up?

Use your arrow keys to move Space Turtle around. Note that he uses his green space force field to handle the socks- turtles are quite hygiene-conscious!

(for advanced users: To change the number of socks to 20 (or any other integer), set nSocks=20 via URL parameters)

Technical Notes:  This game was made to try out two open source projects, the matter.js physics engine and the Replay Game engine.

Assets

- Turtle sprite by Sogomn on OpenGameArt: https://opengameart.org/content/animated-turtle
